description:
Rin next challenge has been delivered and Riki has grown more suspicious of the timing of the notes.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: If Rin-chan Is Happy, I`m Happy, Too
Rin-chan ga Shiawase Nara Watashi mo Shiawase Dakara
Si tu es heureuse, Rin, alors je le serai aussi
鈴ちゃんが幸せならわたしも幸せだから
